label: Hong Kong Post
title: Hong_Kong_Post_(newspaper)
exrest: Hong Kong Post is a Japanese-language weekly newspaper published in Hong Kong every Friday and owned by Mikuni Company. The newspaper first appeared in June 1987. It used to be sold in shops such as Citysuper, but is now free. It was formerly published by Pasona Press (HK) Co., Ltd.
exhtml: Hong Kong Post is a Japanese-language weekly newspaper published in Hong Kong every Friday and owned by Mikuni Company. The newspaper first appeared in June 1987. It used to be sold in shops such as Citysuper, but is now free. It was formerly published by Pasona Press (HK) Co., Ltd.
